name: Hot Damn BBQ
description:
Made for 2018 Summer #ue4jam

Enjoy the calmness of an outdoor picnic in this grill simulation game.

Inspired by games like Animal Crossing and DOOM.

The graphics options doesn't seem to work, I'm really sorry for that.

If you experience performance issues, you can change the settings manually by navigating to
 %LOCALAPPDATA%\UE4JAM_SUM_2018\Saved\Config\WindowsNoEditor folder in File Explorer and modifying the GameUserSettings.ini file.
Change the first section of parameters to the following:

[ScalabilityGroups]
sg.ResolutionQuality=50.000000
sg.ViewDistanceQuality=0
sg.AntiAliasingQuality=0
sg.ShadowQuality=0
sg.PostProcessQuality=0
sg.TextureQuality=0
sg.EffectsQuality=1
sg.FoliageQuality=0

Controls:

Move - WASD
Rotate - Mouse
Interact/Hold - E
Drop - Q
Use held item - Left Mouse Button

Platforms:
Windows

Team:
Darien Sokolov - Music
Dmitry Seregin - 3D Modelling, Texturing, Programming

Pre-made assets:
Grass material and rock material from a previous game project

Third-party assets:
Third Person Game Template
Engine Starter Content
GameJamKit
